title: The Complete Basketball Coaches by John Kimble
description:
The Complete Basketball Coaches Guide to Footwork, Balance, and Pivoting discusses each and every aspect of footwork in detail, including the strengths and weaknesses of different types of pivots for ball handling, shooting, offensive post play, rebounding, screening, and defending and when, where, and why to use them. 

With nearly 200 diagrams of the action, specific footwork, and format of many drills that can be used to learn and practice the various techniques of the different phases of the game, this excellent book provides new insights into the teaching of footwork that can help any team be more explosive, cut down on turnovers, and have confidence on both ends of the floor.

Genre: Non Fiction , Sports
